title: The Valor of Cappen Varra and Two Other Science Fiction Tales
description: Included in this volume are three science fiction works by master Poul Anderson. "The Valor of Cappen Varra" originally appeared in Fantastic Universe January 1957. "Security" originally appeared in Space Science Fiction February 1953. "The Burning Bridge" originally appeared in Astounding Science Fiction January 1960.
author: Poul Anderson
